Banner.Description: I have 8 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Laravel, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 5 years of experience I have covered many roles: Systems Analyst, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, and Technical Lead. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):

exp-1.func-1: Development of APIs with PHP, Laravel and .NET.
exp-1.func-2: Development of interfaces with Laravel (Blade) and jQuery.
exp-1.func-3: Integration of external services, APIs and email.
exp-1.func-4: Design and implementation of SQL Server and MySQL databases.
exp-1.func-6: Updating and maintaining modules on websites.

exp-2.func-2: Developing interfaces with Laravel (Blade) and Vue.
exp-2.func-3: Implementing unit and feature tests with PHPUnit and Jest.
exp-2.func-6: Use of Scrum as an agile methodology.

exp-3.func-1: Development of APIs with Laravel and .NET.
exp-3.func-2: Interface development with Angular, Vue and jQuery.
exp-3.func-4: Designing and implementing SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases.
exp-3.func-5: Integrating external services, such as online payment systems and email.
exp-3.func-6: Creating documentation for developed applications or solutions.
exp-3.func-7: Updating and maintaining assigned web platforms and systems.
exp-3.func-8: Documenting technical processes and development workflows.
exp-3.func-9: Creating user documentation, such as user manuals.
exp-3.func-10: Implementation of unit and feature tests with PHPUnit and Jest.

exp-4.func-2: Developing interfaces with Laravel (Blade) and jQuery.
exp-4.func-5: Design, implementation and administration of the MySQL database.

exp-5.func-1: Development and maintenance of APIs with Laravel.
exp-5.func-2: Development of interfaces with Laravel (Blade) and jQuery.
exp-5.func-3: Updating and maintenance of modules in the ERP.
exp-5.func-4: Administration and configuration of AWS and DigitalOcean.
exp-5.func-5: Design, implementation and maintenance of MySQL and MongoDB databases.
exp-5.func-6: Integration of external services, APIs and email.
exp-5.func-7: Implementation of unit and feature tests with PHPUnit and Jest.
exp-5.func-9: Use of the Scrum agile methodology with Jira as a project management tool.
exp-5.func-10: Optimization of CI/CD, creation of pipelines for deployment to development and production environments along with automated testing.
exp-5.func-12: Documentation of requirements, APIs, deployment, automated testing and creation of manuals.
exp-5.func-13: Participation in Code Review, mentoring and training of junior developers on the team.

exp-6.func-1: Design and development of APIs with .NET.
exp-6.func-2: Integration of internal APIs with external services.
exp-6.func-3: Implementation of software architecture with Clean Architecture, Domain-Driven Design and SOLID principles with Clean Code.
exp-6.func-4: Development and optimization of stored procedures, queries and functions in SQL Server, MySQL and Entity Framework, improving database performance.
exp-6.func-5: Implementation of authentication and authorization using JWT and OAuth 2.0.
exp-6.func-6: Development lifecycle management with Git, Azure DevOps and CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times and manual errors.
exp-6.func-7: Development and implementation of unit and integration tests with xUnit and Moq, ensuring software quality before deployment.
exp-6.func-8: Integration of cloud services using Azure Functions, App Services, Blob Storage and Service Bus.
exp-6.func-9: Documentation of processes, APIs and user manuals, facilitating system learning and maintenance.

exp-7.func-1: Development and maintenance of APIs with FastAPI, Laravel and .NET.
exp-7.func-2: Development of user interfaces with Angular and Vue.
exp-7.func-3: Configuration and management of web servers and SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL and Redis databases.
exp-7.func-4: Integration of external services, such as online payment and email systems.
exp-7.func-6: Use of Scrum as an agile methodology.
exp-7.func-7: Gathering and analyzing functional and non-functional requirements.
exp-7.func-8: Implementation of unit and feature tests with Pytest, PHPUnit and Vitest.
exp-7.func-9: Creation of documentation for developed applications or solutions.
exp-7.func-10: Updating and maintaining assigned web platforms and systems.

exp-8.func-1: Development and maintenance of APIs with Laravel.

exp-8.func-12: Documentation of requirements, components, APIs, deployment and creation of manuals.
exp-8.func-13: Participation in Code Review, mentoring and training of junior developers.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gisselle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for internal company management that covers sales, collection, and tracking departments, very extensive and complex with various functions made in Angular and Laravel. It works with websockets, schedules, laravel jobs, integrations with WordPress, Zadarma, LiveConnect, etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Emelteciot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application for data query, made with Angular and Laravel. The chart.js library is applied.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vas Aviation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application for tracking fuel supply requests for aircraft. It has an email module, real-time notifications, CSV file handling for data import, price quotes. Developed in Angular and Laravel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-learning platform developed with WordPress. Fully customized design, with plugins developed from scratch. It has a customized payment module, virtual classroom, course tracking dashboard.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-commerce platform for technology products. Developed with WordPress and implementing a shipping system for products. It has sales reporting through customized programming.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu Super Plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plans quote that has an advanced search engine. The plans are shown based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has a live chat, contact form, notification system via WhatsApp and email, auth, and information management through the admin role.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
